ygData.subject: Petition????
ygData.msgSnippet: What ever happened to that petition someone was starting.  I have thought much about the changes we want. I think that there should be no large changes. You
ygData.messageBody:
What ever happened to that petition someone was
starting. I have thought much about the changes we
want. I think that there should be no large changes.
You are forgetting that this is not supposed to be a
solo game and it is not supposed to be a exclusive
fighting game. This is a role playing game. Role
playing does involve fightng however so i am not
against alll changes. I am tired of a petition from
every single *&%^ class about how they are uneven and
need to be made better. They are uneven for a reason.
It is a GROUP game. If there was a group (i know only
6 per group theoreticly speaking though) and there was
one of each class in it they could easily kill
something 2-5 levels higher then them. But if one of
the classes left say the warrior and got replaced by
the supposed "most damage doing class" wizard the
group would be killed because there is not a warrior
which is the best tank. Sure the paladin and shadow
knight would tank but the would not lasts nearly as
long as the warrior. I don't mind minor changes like
adding a non combat related spell that is what i call
"god bestowed" where as in the shadow knights case if
they got invisibility it should be something that the
evil god's do that makes them invisible such as
turning them into a shadow. As long as the change can
be "god bestowed" it is ok but just 'oh my paladin is
not good enough to solo i need a bow even though it is
against the code of paladins' complaing type changes
that are against the RPing story of that class.

===
